thread.title: Voter Guide | November 2015 General Assembly elections
thread.title_full: Voter Guide | November 2015 General Assembly elections | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: Voter Guide | November 2015 General Assembly elections
text:
Election Day is Tuesday, Nov. 3 . Polls will be open from 6 a.m. to 7 p.m. The Virginian-Pilot put together a voter guide for the contested legislative races in South Hampton Roads:
Virginia Senate District 6 
Virginia Senate District 7 
Virginia Senate District 8 
Virginia House District 21 
Virginia House District 81 
Virginia House District 82 
Virginia House District 100 
For a full list of candidates in all of the state and local races or to find out where to vote , visit the Virginia Department of Elections .
